function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Situations where people are in close proximity in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing measures, use of personal protective equipment, and proper ventilation","Technologies":"Monitoring systems for crowd density, air quality sensors","People":"City residents, visitors, and workers","Owner":"City authorities and building managers"},{"Description":"Different time, day, and month scenarios representing varied levels of crowd density and activity","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission in crowded areas and at peak activity times","Mitigation":"Regulating crowd density, staggering work and school times, and promoting remote work","Technologies":"Real-time occupancy monitoring, scheduling software, telecommuting platforms","People":"City residents, workers, and students","Owner":"City authorities and employers"}]}
